body: 建表默认是3副本，3副本的表，必须有至少3台独立的物理机（不同ip），只是有3个BE是不够的。方便的话可以加下微信 morningman-cmy，交流更及时。
palo如果不启动多租户的功能默认都在default_cluster里面，登录名之类的在各种客户端直接就是root或者创建的用户名，如果是你自己创建的cluster，所以你的root登录名应该是root@cluster_name否则一些客户端兼容性会有问题。

1. 使用BDB JE是解决元数据高可用的。元数据更新量较小使用这种方案，BE我们现在是批量导入方式，所以不适合使用这种一致性方案。
2. 多个table原子生效还是基于Palo是批量导入方式，版本号是记录在元数据里面的，所有表的数据都就绪后再提升版本号，这样就能够保证所有表的一并生效。可以理解为表级别的锁
3. 当前阶段LLVM是Impala自身的。命名为Palo*是由于这部分代码长时间存在于baidu内部，我们内部修改替换的

非常感谢！据你的回答，

1，这让我感觉很失望，看来跟腾讯／阿里用Paxos做binlog同步的机制不是一样的？
2，MVCC的粒度感觉没那么细，并不是Oracle那种级别的

那就是说Palo的数据源主要是来自批量导入BE的部分？它作为MPP数据库，主要还是用于OLAP类应用，不是大规模并发OLTP？我在想MPP似乎处理不了分布式事务和分布式JOIN查询。。。

OLAP设计还是主要面向分析的，更加注重的是怎样高效扫描、计算大量的数据。而OLTP更多的是解决事务请求，注重的更多的是事物之间的隔离性。

还有你说的MPP是能够处理分布式join的。而分布式事务跟MPP是完全两个正交的事情，相互之间是没有排斥的关系的，是完全能够实现在一个系统里面的。不实现的原因是会增加系统的复杂度，不如在某一方面更加擅长。

HDFS导入需要部署HDFS Broker，可以参见我们文档。

需要加入Palo微信技术讨论群的，请加微信号：myh13161636186，然后备注一下：加入Palo技术讨论群

该问题已解决：
1. 用户使用的是默认的 hadoop load 方式，该方式目前github版本不提供，只提供百度内部使用。
2. 外部用户可以使用 通过 http 方式导入本地文件的 mini load 方式（help mini load）。也可以通过 broker 读取 hdfs 或者 baidu bos 的数据进行导入（详见 help load 中的 broker相关部分）
这是一个bug，我已经修复提交了，辛苦更新为最新的代码后再试试，详见 #125
这个可能和 #123 有关，因为部分客户端连接后会查询information_schema库，现在已经修复了，请更新到最新代码后再试下
ok!新版本可以查询了！

        mysql> select * from table1;
        ERROR 1064 (HY000): exec rpc errorUNKONWN
在 install.md 的常见问题中，有这个问题的解决方法。

eg:
priority_networks=192.168.21.0/24

支持SQL-92,TPC-H的内部跑过，但是是在新版本是发布的，过段时间新版本上会一起发布到github上。

是否能查询明细，取决你的列的定义和聚合方式的选择。比如在指标列上选择了sum的聚合方式。那么Palo会将维度列相同的行，在指标列上做求和存储。假设你每一行都有一个UniqID作为维度列，那么就相当于保证了没有任意两行的维度列是相同的，那么Palo也就不会进行聚合，这样，明细数据就保留下来了。

Palo存储的数据是按Key进行排序的，但是这个和明细数据没有关系。如果按照排序列的前缀进行查询，效率会比较高。
谢谢

昨天编译是在centos6上编译的，今天安装了centos 7.5 minimal版本，然后安装了一些有依赖，第三方的包编译都没问题，在./build.sh后，到最后的啥时候报错了
[100%] Building CXX object src/service/CMakeFiles/palo_be.dir/palo_main.cpp.o
Linking CXX executable palo_be
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lstdc++
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [src/service/palo_be] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/service/CMakeFiles/palo_be.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

我检查了libstdc++.so，我也建立了软连接，但是还是报错，怎么解决呢，大拿
解决了，必须安装libstdc++-static这个包才可以
感谢提供解决方案
可以参考这个 https://github.com/baidu/palo/issues/197

这个log不是导致程序挂掉的原因。
可以把程序挂掉时候的堆栈打印出来，我们这边看一下

be.out输出的异常堆栈信息：

*** Aborted at 1528864101 (unix time) try "date -d @1528864101" if you are using GNU date ***
PC: @           0xb9242a palo::TupleIsNullPredicate::get_boolean_val()
*** SIGSEGV (@0x0) received by PID 222 (TID 0x7f5008be5700) from PID 0; stack trace: ***

@imay 麻烦看下。
可以把你的查询贴一下么？我们这边尝试复现下

SELECT if(flow.datetime is null,
        oder.datetime,
        flow.datetime),
        if(flow.date is null,
        oder.date,
        flow.date),
        if(flow.hourly_grain is null,
        oder.hourly_grain,
        flow.hourly_grain),
         if(flow.website_id is null,
        oder.website_id,
        flow.website_id),
        if(flow.platform_id is null,
        oder.platform_id,
        flow.platform_id),
         if(oder.sku_order_num is null,
        0,
        oder.sku_order_num),
        if(oder.ref_order_num is null,
        0,
        oder.ref_order_num),
         if(oder.ref_amount is null,
        0,
        oder.ref_amount),
        if(oder.sku_paid_num is null,
        0,
        oder.sku_paid_num),
         if(oder.paid_order_num is null,
        0,
        oder.paid_order_num),
        if(oder.paid_amount is null,
        0,
        oder.paid_amount),
         if(flow.page_pv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_pv),
        if(flow.page_uv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_uv),
        if(flow.page_cart_uv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_cart_uv),
         if(flow.page_checkout_uv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_checkout_uv),
        if(flow.page_product_pv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_product_pv),
        if(flow.page_product_uv is null,
        0,
        flow.page_product_uv),
         if(flow.sku_cart_num is null,
        0,
        flow.sku_cart_num),
        if(flow.session_viewproduct_count is null,
        0,
        flow.session_viewproduct_count),
        if(flow.session_viewproduct_out_count is null,
        0,
        flow.session_viewproduct_out_count)
FROM dm__bi.profile_report flow full outer
JOIN 
  (SELECT if(tc.`datetime` is null,
        tp.`datetime`,
        tc.`datetime`) AS `datetime`,
         if(tc.date is null,
        tp.date,
        tc.date) AS date,
         if(tc.hourly_grain is null,
        tp.hourly_grain,
        tc.hourly_grain) AS hourly_grain,
         if(tc.website_id is null,
        tp.website_id,
        tc.website_id) AS website_id,
         if(tc.platform_id is null,
        tp.platform_id,
        tc.platform_id) AS platform_id,
         if(tc.sku_num is null,
        0,
        tc.sku_num) AS sku_order_num,
         if(tc.`count` is null,
        0,
        tc.`count`) AS ref_order_num,
         if(round((tc.amount * cer.rate),
        4) is null,
        0,
        round((tc.amount * cer.rate),
        4)) AS ref_amount,
         if(tp.sku_num is null,
        0,
        tp.sku_num) AS sku_paid_num,
         if(tp.`count` is null,
        0,
        tp.`count`) AS paid_order_num,
         if(round((tp.amount * cer.rate),
        4) is null,
        0,
        round((tp.amount * cer.rate),
        4)) AS paid_amount
  FROM ( 
    (SELECT '37' AS website_id,
        CASE
        WHEN order_source = 'android_app' THEN
        3
        WHEN order_source = 'ios_app' THEN
        4
        WHEN order_source = 'mobile_web' THEN
        2
        WHEN order_source = 'mobile_pc_web' THEN
        2
        WHEN order_source = 'wechat' THEN
        5
        ELSE 1
        END AS platform_id, hour(hours_add(sfo.created_at,8)) AS hourly_grain, cast(regexp_replace(date(hours_add(sfo.created_at,8)),'-','') AS int) AS `date`, DATE_FORMAT(hours_add(sfo.created_at,8),'%Y%m%d%H') AS `datetime`, max(sfo.order_currency_code) AS order_currency_code, sum(sfoi.qty_ordered) AS sku_num,max(sfo.grand_total) AS amount,count(distinct sfoi.order_id) AS `count`
    FROM ods__babyhaven__babyhaven.sales_flat_order sfo
    JOIN ods__babyhaven__babyhaven.sales_flat_order_item sfoi
        ON (sfoi.order_id = sfo.entity_id)
    WHERE hours_add(sfo.created_at,8) >= '2018-05-01 00:00:00'
            AND hours_add(sfo.created_at,8) < '2018-06-01 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY  `datetime`,date,hourly_grain,platform_id ) ) tc full outer
    JOIN ( 
      (SELECT '37' AS website_id,
          CASE
          WHEN order_source = 'android_app' THEN
          3
          WHEN order_source = 'ios_app' THEN
          4
          WHEN order_source = 'mobile_web' THEN
          2
          WHEN order_source = 'mobile_pc_web' THEN
          2
          WHEN order_source = 'wechat' THEN
          5
          ELSE 1
          END AS platform_id, hour(hours_add(sfo.paid_at,8)) AS hourly_grain, cast(regexp_replace(date(hours_add(sfo.paid_at,8)),'-','') AS int) AS `date`, DATE_FORMAT(hours_add(sfo.paid_at,8),'%Y%m%d%H') AS `datetime`, max(sfo.order_currency_code) AS order_currency_code, sum(sfoi.qty_ordered) AS sku_num,max(sfo.grand_total) AS amount,count(distinct sfoi.order_id) AS `count`
      FROM ods__babyhaven__babyhaven.sales_flat_order sfo
      JOIN ods__babyhaven__babyhaven.sales_flat_order_item sfoi
          ON (sfoi.order_id = sfo.entity_id)
      WHERE hours_add(sfo.paid_at,8) >= '2018-05-01 00:00:00'
              AND hours_add(sfo.paid_at,8) < '2018-06-01 00:00:00'
      GROUP BY  `datetime`,date,hourly_grain,platform_id ) ) tp
          ON (tc.website_id = tp.website_id
              AND tc.platform_id = tp.platform_id
              AND tc.hourly_grain = tp.hourly_grain
              AND tc.date = tp.date)
      LEFT JOIN dm__bi.currency_exchange_rate cer
          ON (cer.currency_code = tc.order_currency_code
              AND cer.date = floor(tc.`date`/100)) ) oder
        ON (oder.date = flow.date
            AND oder.hourly_grain = flow.hourly_grain
            AND oder.website_id = flow.website_id
            AND oder.platform_id = flow.platform_id)
  WHERE flow.datetime >= 2018050100
        AND flow.datetime < 2018060100 limit 10
https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/74a3f3f945403b50515c658047d3284955288a637207e4f97ecc15d1@%3Cgeneral.incubator.apache.org%3E
麻烦把你的建表语句发一下。

CREATE TABLE `profile_report` (
  `datetime` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "时间 2018060601",
  `website_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT "站点id",
  `platform_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT "平台id",
  `date` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "日期 20180606",
  `hourly_grain` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT "小时",
  `ref_order_num` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "订单数",
  `paid_order_num` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "支付订单数",
  `ref_amount` decimal(20, 4) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "订单金额",
  `paid_amount` decimal(20, 4) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "支付订单金额",
  `page_pv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "页面pv",
  `page_uv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "页面uv",
  `page_cart_uv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "购物车uv",
  `page_checkout_uv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "提交订单uv",
  `page_product_pv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "商详页pv",
  `page_product_uv` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "商详页uv",
  `sku_cart_num` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "加购sku件数",
  `sku_order_num` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "下单sku件量",
  `sku_paid_num` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "支付sku件量",
  `session_viewproduct_count` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "商详session总数",
  `session_viewproduct_out_count` int(11) REPLACE DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "商详session跳出数",
  `count` tinyint(4) REPLACE DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "统计1"
) ENGINE=OLAP
AGGREGATE KEY(`datetime`, `website_id`, `platform_id`, `date`, `hourly_grain`)
PARTITION BY RANGE(`datetime`)
(PARTITION y2016 VALUES LESS THAN ("2017010100"),
PARTITION y2017 VALUES LESS THAN ("2018010100"),
PARTITION y2018 VALUES LESS THAN ("2019010100"),
PARTITION y2019 VALUES LESS THAN ("2020010100"))
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`date`, `website_id`) BUCKETS 6
PROPERTIES (
"storage_type" = "COLUMN"
);

CREATE TABLE `sales_flat_order` (
  `entity_id` int(11) COMMENT "__PRI__",
  `state` varchar(512) COMMENT "State",
  `status` varchar(512) COMMENT "Status",
  `coupon_code` varchar(512) COMMENT "Coupon Code",
  `protect_code` varchar(512) COMMENT "Protect Code",
  `shipping_description` varchar(512) COMMENT "Shipping Description",
  `is_virtual` int(11) COMMENT "Is Virtual",
  `store_id` int(11) COMMENT "Store Id",
  `customer_id` int(11) COMMENT "Customer Id",
  `base_discount_amount` double COMMENT "Base Discount Amount",
  `base_discount_canceled` double COMMENT "Base Discount Canceled",
  `base_discount_invoiced` double COMMENT "Base Discount Invoiced",
  `base_discount_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Discount Refunded",
  `base_grand_total` double COMMENT "Base Grand Total",
  `base_shipping_amount` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Amount",
  `base_shipping_canceled` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Canceled",
  `base_shipping_invoiced` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Invoiced",
  `base_shipping_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Refunded",
  `base_shipping_tax_amount` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Tax Amount",
  `base_shipping_tax_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Tax Refunded",
  `base_subtotal` double COMMENT "Base Subtotal",
  `base_subtotal_canceled` double COMMENT "Base Subtotal Canceled",
  `base_subtotal_invoiced` double COMMENT "Base Subtotal Invoiced",
  `base_subtotal_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Subtotal Refunded",
  `base_tax_amount` double COMMENT "Base Tax Amount",
  `base_tax_canceled` double COMMENT "Base Tax Canceled",
  `base_tax_invoiced` double COMMENT "Base Tax Invoiced",
  `base_tax_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Tax Refunded",
  `base_to_global_rate` double COMMENT "Base To Global Rate",
  `base_to_order_rate` double COMMENT "Base To Order Rate",
  `base_total_canceled` double COMMENT "Base Total Canceled",
  `base_total_invoiced` double COMMENT "Base Total Invoiced",
  `base_total_invoiced_cost` double COMMENT "Base Total Invoiced Cost",
  `base_total_offline_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Total Offline Refunded",
  `base_total_online_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Total Online Refunded",
  `base_total_paid` double COMMENT "Base Total Paid",
  `base_total_qty_ordered` double COMMENT "Base Total Qty Ordered",
  `base_total_refunded` double COMMENT "Base Total Refunded",
  `discount_amount` double COMMENT "Discount Amount",
  `discount_canceled` double COMMENT "Discount Canceled",
  `discount_invoiced` double COMMENT "Discount Invoiced",
  `discount_refunded` double COMMENT "Discount Refunded",
  `grand_total` double COMMENT "Grand Total",
  `shipping_amount` double COMMENT "Shipping Amount",
  `shipping_canceled` double COMMENT "Shipping Canceled",
  `shipping_invoiced` double COMMENT "Shipping Invoiced",
  `shipping_refunded` double COMMENT "Shipping Refunded",
  `shipping_tax_amount` double COMMENT "Shipping Tax Amount",
  `shipping_tax_refunded` double COMMENT "Shipping Tax Refunded",
  `store_to_base_rate` double COMMENT "Store To Base Rate",
  `store_to_order_rate` double COMMENT "Store To Order Rate",
  `subtotal` double COMMENT "Subtotal",
  `subtotal_canceled` double COMMENT "Subtotal Canceled",
  `subtotal_invoiced` double COMMENT "Subtotal Invoiced",
  `subtotal_refunded` double COMMENT "Subtotal Refunded",
  `tax_amount` double COMMENT "Tax Amount",
  `tax_canceled` double COMMENT "Tax Canceled",
  `tax_invoiced` double COMMENT "Tax Invoiced",
  `tax_refunded` double COMMENT "Tax Refunded",
  `total_canceled` double COMMENT "Total Canceled",
  `total_invoiced` double COMMENT "Total Invoiced",
  `total_offline_refunded` double COMMENT "Total Offline Refunded",
  `total_online_refunded` double COMMENT "Total Online Refunded",
  `total_paid` double COMMENT "Total Paid",
  `total_qty_ordered` double COMMENT "Total Qty Ordered",
  `total_refunded` double COMMENT "Total Refunded",
  `can_ship_partially` int(11) COMMENT "Can Ship Partially",
  `can_ship_partially_item` int(11) COMMENT "Can Ship Partially Item",
  `customer_is_guest` int(11) COMMENT "Customer Is Guest",
  `customer_note_notify` int(11) COMMENT "Customer Note Notify",
  `billing_address_id` int(11) COMMENT "Billing Address Id",
  `customer_group_id` int(11) COMMENT "Customer Group Id",
  `edit_increment` int(11) COMMENT "Edit Increment",
  `email_sent` int(11) COMMENT "Email Sent",
  `forced_shipment_with_invoice` int(11) COMMENT "Forced Do Shipment With Invoice",
  `payment_auth_expiration` int(11) COMMENT "Payment Authorization Expiration",
  `quote_address_id` int(11) COMMENT "Quote Address Id",
  `quote_id` int(11) COMMENT "Quote Id",
  `shipping_address_id` int(11) COMMENT "Shipping Address Id",
  `adjustment_negative` double COMMENT "Adjustment Negative",
  `adjustment_positive` double COMMENT "Adjustment Positive",
  `base_adjustment_negative` double COMMENT "Base Adjustment Negative",
  `base_adjustment_positive` double COMMENT "Base Adjustment Positive",
  `base_shipping_discount_amount` double COMMENT "Base Shipping Discount Amount",
  `base_subtotal_incl_tax` double COMMENT "Base Subtotal Incl Tax",
  `base_total_due` double COMMENT "Base Total Due",
  `payment_authorization_amount` double COMMENT "Payment Authorization Amount",
  `shipping_discount_amount` double COMMENT "Shipping Discount Amount",
  `subtotal_incl_tax` double COMMENT "Subtotal Incl Tax",
  `total_due` double COMMENT "Total Due",
  `weight` double COMMENT "Weight",
  `customer_dob` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Dob",
  `increment_id` varchar(512) COMMENT "Increment Id",
  `applied_rule_ids` varchar(512) COMMENT "Applied Rule Ids",
  `base_currency_code` varchar(512) COMMENT "Base Currency Code",
  `customer_email` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Email",
  `customer_firstname` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Firstname",
  `customer_lastname` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Lastname",
  `customer_middlename` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Middlename",
  `customer_prefix` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Prefix",
  `customer_suffix` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Suffix",
  `customer_taxvat` varchar(512) COMMENT "Customer Taxvat",
  `discount_description` varchar(512) COMMENT "Discount Description",
  `ext_customer_id` varchar(512) COMMENT "Ext Customer Id",
  `ext_order_id` varchar(512) COMMENT "Ext Order Id",
  `global_currency_code` varchar(512) COMMENT "Global Currency Code",
  `hold_before_state` varchar(512) COMMENT "Hold Before State",
  `hold_before_status` varchar(512) COMMENT "Hold Before Status",
  `order_currency_code` varchar(512) COMMENT "Order Currency Code",
  `original_increment_id` varchar(512) COMMENT "Original Increment Id",
  `relation_child_id` varchar(512) COMMENT "Relation Child Id",

UNIQUE KEY(`item_id`)
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`item_id`) BUCKETS 6

);
CREATE TABLE `currency_exchange_rate` (
  `date` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "年月日",
  `currency_code` varchar(10) NOT NULL COMMENT "币种",
  `rate` decimal(12, 8) REPLACE DEFAULT "0.0" COMMENT "汇率",
  `count` tinyint(4) REPLACE DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "统计1"
) ENGINE=OLAP
AGGREGATE KEY(`date`, `currency_code`)
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`date`) BUCKETS 6
PROPERTIES (
"storage_type" = "COLUMN"
);

好的，谢谢。我试一下这种方式。

您好，按照您的方式测试，报如下问题:ERROR 5025 (HY000): fail to convert mysql value '1899-12-31 00:00:00' TO DATETIME。
但是满足文档中的DATETIME类型的数据范围啊。
`DATETIME数据类型：范围: ['1000-01-01 00:00:00', '9999-12-31 00:00:00']。默认的打印形式是’YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’。`
@imay 如果，我把这个字段的值改成1900-01-01 00:00:00 就可以成功执行了。这是不是bug。。
我注意到：如果我依照DATE类型的key设置了partition，那么第一个分区一直都是从1900-01-01开始的，是不是palo系统的日期类型的数据的范围是`['1900-01-01 00:00:00', '9999-12-31 00:00:00']`.而不是文档中说的`['1000-01-01 00:00:00', '9999-12-31 00:00:00']`
@ws2823147532 引擎存储的date类型最小应该是1900-01-01开始
谢谢

当前在同一个批次中，相同的Key的数据是不能够保证有序的。

也就是说，对于最后那个value能够看到，是未定义的。
但是如果我把聚合类型改成sum，就能把所有相同key的求和，这让我的点困惑，有没有文档描述这些区别，或者这样设计的原因。

@gunli sum是满足交换率的，replace是不满足交换率的。在我们进行数据处理的过程中，会对数据进行排序，但是我们处理可能会引入分布式处理这样没有办法保证顺序一定与输入的数据的顺序是一致的。

所以，最后的结果可能是不稳定的
好的，谢谢你的热心解答。
